description.value: Once per day, you can deploy your seedpod as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. When deployed this way, your seedpod can travel up to 200 feet away from you, with a fly Speed of 20 feet. Moving the seedpod is a free action, which you can take once per turn, and you can sense through it in all directions as if using your normal senses. After 1 minute, the seedpod returns directly to you at its normal Speed.

publication.title: Starfinder Murder in Metal City Deluxe Adventure
